messages.subject: RE: [samuraihistory] Punctuation
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yep, quite possibly. Then adequate ... Eventually. Where Will It ... Oh, I don t Know. Maybe I ll require Everyone to post With Random Capitalization, like
messages.messageBody:
--- Silk Road School <silk.road.school@...>
wrote:

> Nate, Nate. Snap out of it, man. Next thing you
> know, you're going to
> expect basic grammar out of people.

Yep, quite possibly.

Then adequate
> spelling.

Eventually.

Where Will It
> All Lead, we ask?

Oh, I don't Know. Maybe I'll require Everyone to post
With Random Capitalization, like the Etiquette Girls
Write. Wouldn't that be Fun?

Think of all the folks who won't
> be able to post their
> assertions about fictional characters named from the
> Qaballah, and The True
> Nature of Bushido (not your silly historical thing
> with all the
> documentation, the REAL real thing), and... say,
> sign me up.

Well, we mustn't let musty old reality get in the way,
I say. Actually, the scary thing is they'd be
perfectly free to post as they wish--just in complete
sentences with proper punctuation.



__________________________________

messages.subject: RE: [samuraihistory] Punctuation
messages.msgSnippet: Nate, Nate.  Snap out of it, man.  Next thing you know, you re going to expect basic grammar out of people.  Then adequate spelling.  Where Will It All Lead,
messages.messageBody:
Nate, Nate. Snap out of it, man. Next thing you know, you're going to
expect basic grammar out of people. Then adequate spelling. Where Will It
All Lead, we ask? Think of all the folks who won't be able to post their
assertions about fictional characters named from the Qaballah, and The True
Nature of Bushido (not your silly historical thing with all the
documentation, the REAL real thing), and... say, sign me up.
Gereg
